name: Mad Monkey Kings Cross
description:
With air conditioning throughout, you'll stay cool in the summer and warm in the winter, comfortable year-round. Our dedicated team hosts amazing social events, from free dinner to beer games and chill movie nights, ensuring your Sydney experience is packed with memories. 

Welcome to Mad Monkey Kings Cross, where friendly faces, awesome events, and cool comfort come together for an unforgettable Sydney stay! We've created the perfect environment to mix chilled-out moments with a vibrant party atmosphere, making it easy to connect with travellers from around the globe and feel part of our Mad Monkey family.
Our common areas are designed for fun and relaxation. Challenge your new mates on the arcade machine, enjoy a game of darts, or kick back in our TV/gaming room. Plus, start your day right with free barista coffee available at the Happy Travels shop!

Your stay includes:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Large, Secure Lockers (bring your own padlock)
- Complimentary Tea & Coffee
- Massive TV/Gaming Room with Arcade & Darts
- Organised Social Events 7 days a week
- Air-Conditioned Comfort
- Free Barista Coffee (at Happy Travels)

Located directly in the heart of Kings Cross, you're surrounded by Sydney's most vibrant nightlife, cafes, and eateries. Plus, with the train station just a 2-minute walk, exploring the CBD, Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and beautiful beaches is incredibly convenient.

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception hours are 8 am - 8 pm. If you're checking in after these hours, please give us a call beforehand.
- Check-out is before 10 am and check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid passport or international passport is needed for check-in.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- Please note: No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

Join us at Mad Monkey Kings Cross – your gateway to an amazing Sydney adventure with new friends!

houseRules.notes:
We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35.

Reception is open 8am to 8pm. If arriving after these hours please email the hostel directly to organise a late check in.  

NOTE: 
A valid, physical passport is required for check in, no copies or pictures.

All payments made by debit or credit card at the property are subject to a 1% credit card fee.
Please note that we do have a lot of stairs on site.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Mad Monkey Family!

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
